title: Allow Microsoft Visual C++ support for accessing Microsoft.Phone.Info.DeviceStatus available in C#
body: Currently, Microsoft.Phone.Info.DeviceStatus is available to know the device manufacturer and it is only accesible from C# project making it a round way about to include this project in C++ ( managed code). It would be helpful if we have an equivalent API available in C++.

comments.body:
Far, far more important is access to ApplicationMemoryUsageLimit. Our app needs to know if we have 300MB or 100MB of memory available so we can scale features. There's even a whole MSDN article about how to do this. Paradoxically, in the languages where you go when you want to ignore memory usage, you can access this information but in the language you use when you want to optimize your memory usage, you can't access this information.
Expect all professional game developers to demand this, btw.
